vstore.framework.logging

Class LogFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • vstore.framework.logging.LogFile

  • public class LogFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Misuses a Java Preference file for implementing a simple and easy to use "log file".

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Avoid instantiation

        Gets the Preferences file

      • contains

        public static boolean contains(java.lang.String uuid)
        Checks if the log file contains an entry with the given key.
        Parameters:
        uuid - The key of the entry to search for.
        Returns:
        True, if an entry is found in the log file

      • logEntry

        public static void logEntry(java.lang.String uuid,
                            java.lang.String data)
        Adds the given information to the logfile
        Parameters:
        uuid - The uuid to add.
        data - The data string to add for the uuid key.

      • getEntry

        public static java.lang.String getEntry(java.lang.String uuid)
        Gets the entry with the given key from the log file.
        Parameters:
        uuid - The key of the entry to read.
        Returns:
        The corresponding entry of the log file.

      • deleteEntry

        Parameters:
